abilities.name: Atraposâ€™ Duty
abilities.rule: While a model is affected by this ability, each time that model makes an attack that targets a **TITANIC** or **TOWERING** model, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll.

abilities.name: Macro-extinction Protocols
abilities.rule: Each time this model makes an attack that targets a **MONSTER** or **VEHICLE** unit, add 1 to the Hit roll. If that target is **TITANIC** or **TOWERING**, add 1 to the Wound roll as well.
